biocontainers.name: calib
biocontainers.summary: Clustering without alignment using (locality sensitive hashing) LSH and MinHashing of barcoded reads

biotools.summary: This package contains functions for normalizing spotted microarray data, based on a physically motivated calibration model. The model parameters and error distributions are estimated from external control spikes.

bioschemas.name: CALIB
bioschemas.summary: This package contains functions for normalizing spotted microarray data, based on a physically motivated calibration model. The model parameters and error distributions are estimated from external control spikes.
